text: Rodrigo "Rody" Roa Duterte Personal Data from i-site.ph. URL last accessed 2006-10-14. (born March 28, 1945), nicknamed Digong, is a Filipino lawyer and politician who was the President of the Philippines from 2016 to 2022. As of 2025, he is in detention in the Netherlands.https://www.bangkokpost.com/world/3016225/duterte-lawyers-ask-icc- to-throw-out-case-order-his-release?tbref=hp. Retrieved 2025-05-02 He is in the custody of the ICC, an international court. He was supposed to be in court, on March 14; However, he did not come to the court room.https://www.nrk.no/urix/den-tidligere-filippinske-presidenten-rodrigo- duterte-i-den-internasjonale-straffedomstolen-1.17340010. Retrieved 2025-03-14https://www.vg.no/nyheter/i/KMRLAM/icc-bekrefter-at-duterte-er- framme-i-nederland-etter-paagripelsen. Retrieved 2025-03-14 Earlier in March 2025, the government of Philippines arrested him, and put him on an airplane that [went] to the Netherlands.https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cp9ykn85401o. Retrieved 2025-03-11 He was born in the city of Maasin, Leyte. ==Career as politician== He announced that he would run as a candidate for President of the Philippines on November 21, 2015. On May 9, 2016, Duterte was elected president. He was mayor of Davao City from 1988 through 1998, from 2000 through 2010, and from 2013 through 2016. In August 2021, he announced his candidacy for Vice President of the Philippines. In October 2021, Rodrigo Duterte announced that he was not running for vice-presidency in 2022 and would retire from political life. ==Family== His daughter Sara Duterte ran and was elected vice president in a landslide victory in May 2022. His son, Sebastian Duterte, was elected as Davao City mayor. ==Related pages== *Duterte fist ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Deists Category:Filipino lawyers Category:Filipino mayors Category:Presidents of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Davao del Sur
title: Rodrigo Duterte
